actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to provide Federal revenue assistance to local governments by extending Federal revenue sharing for local governmental units for 5 3/4 additional years, with specific concentration of assistance to cities of 500,000 population or more.

summary.text: Extends, under the State and Local Fiscal Assistance Act, Federal revenue sharing for local governmental units for five and three-quarters years at specified rates. Allocates additional funds to cities having a population of 500,000 or more as specified in the Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide Federal revenue assistance to local governments by extending Federal revenue sharing for local governmental units for 5 3/4 additional years, with specific concentration of assistance to cities of 500,000 population or more.
